description: A major theme for anyone in working research is how best to publish and disseminate their work. These days a wide range of tools are available to help, at every stage of the writing process - from great Python libraries for charting, to online bibliography tool and LaTeX packages to beautify your papers. This panel discussion will cover all aspects of dissemination work, and how Python can ease your publication pain.
title: Discussion: From data to dissemination: dealing with publications
